org.apache.spark.internal.io

Class SparkHadoopWriterUtils

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.internal.io.SparkHadoopWriterUtils

  • public class SparkHadoopWriterUtils
extends Object
    A helper object that provide common utils used during saving an RDD using a Hadoop OutputFormat (both from the old mapred API and the new mapreduce API)
